title: Migrants cross English Channel to UK for first time in 2024
description: Migrants crossing the English Channel to the UK have been reported for the first time in 2024. Arrivals had not been recorded since 16 December, according to Home Office figures, with poor weather conditions potentially contributing to the lack of activity at sea. It means there had been 27 days of no crossings until today.
